channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Prosecutors: Suspect in shooting of two Minnesota state lawmakers planned to target two others
item.description: The man accused of killing a Minnesota lawmaker and wounding another went to the homes of two other lawmakers to carry out more carnage on the night of the shootings.

item.title: Friends say Minnesota shooting suspect was deeply religious and conservative
A teenager with a job making burritos became a powerful Minnesota lawmaker who trained service dogs
